label: Compact Bluetooth Gateway: Mobile Monitoring
description: Compact Bluetooth Gateway is based on Bluetooth5.0 technology and LoRaWAN. It receives nearby Bluetooth beacons messages and transmits them to the server through LoRaWAN. The built-in 600mAh rechargeable battery makes it last about 10 hours when not powered. The standby time can be significantly extended by changing Bluetooth receiving settings.
